about_the_game: This patch removes all censorship from images with adult content, and disables the automatic skip of sex scenes in the SFW release version.

content_descriptors.notes:
This Game contains content not appropriate for all ages.
Some characters involved in sexual content in the game are not human. Other races include catgirls, elves, demons, alraunes (plant-girls), and many other non-human races.

The game contains:
- Strong language
- Sexual language
- Partial nudity 
- Sexual content
- Sexual assault/non-consensual sex
- General mature content
- Mild fantasy violence

- Not suitable for playing at work
- Not suitable for all ages
- All characters in the game that are involved in events with sexual content are over 18 years old

detailed_description: This patch removes all censorship from images with adult content, and disables the automatic skip of sex scenes in the SFW release version.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 or Steam OS 2.0 ()
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.10
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible OpenGLR
